鄼字的基本解释

鄼
zàn
同“酇”。

鄼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zàn］
［《廣韻》則旰切，去翰，精。］
［《廣韻》在丸切，平桓，從。］
［《廣韻》作管切，上緩，精。］
“攢2”的被通假字。亦作“鄼1”。“酂1”的繁体字。
(1)周代郊外地方组织单位之一。一百家为酇。
(2)犹缀。古代乐舞时舞人行位的标记。
(3)古县名。在今湖北省老河口市西北。汉时属南阳郡。
[②]［cuó］
［《集韻》才何切，平戈，從。］
亦作“鄼2”。“酂2”的繁体字。
(1)古县名。汉时属沛郡。在今河南省永城县西。
(2)通“醝”。白酒。参见“酇2白”。

鄼字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　鄼； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1279第07
同酇。詳後酇字註。

鄼字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鄼字的起名意思

暂无。

鄼
Basic explanation of words
鄼
zàn
Same as "酂".
鄼
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zàn］
["Guangyun" is cut, go to Han, fine. ]
["Guangyun" is cut in Maru, Pinghuan, from. ]
["Guangyun" is a pipe cut, slow up and fine. ]
"Zan 2" was passed falsely. Also known as "鄼1". "酂1" in traditional characters.
(1) One of the local organizations in the outskirts of Zhou Dynasty. Hundreds of homes are the meeting place.
(2) Still embellished. The mark of the dancer's position in ancient music and dance.
(3) The name of the ancient county. In today's northwest of Laohekou City, Hubei Province. Han Dynasty belonged to Nanyang County.
[②]［cuó］
[How to cut "Jiyun", Ping Ge, from. ]
Also known as "鄼2". "酂2" in traditional characters.
(1) The name of the ancient county. The Han Dynasty belonged to Pei County. In the west of Yongcheng County, Henan Province today.
(2) Through "醝". Liquor. See "酂2白".
鄼
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　鄼; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1279 Page 07
Same 酂. Detailed note after the word.
鄼
